Package smile.math.kernel

Class BinarySparseThinPlateSplineKernel

java.lang.Object
smile.math.kernel.ThinPlateSpline
smile.math.kernel.BinarySparseThinPlateSplineKernel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ToDoubleBiFunction<int[],int[]>, Function, IsotropicKernel, MercerKernel<int[]>
public class BinarySparseThinPlateSplineKernel extends ThinPlateSpline implements MercerKernel<int[]>
The Thin Plate Spline kernel on binary sparse data.

k(u, v) = (||u-v|| / σ)2 log (||u-v|| / σ)

where σ > 0 is the scale parameter of the kernel. The kernel can work on sparse binary array as int[], which are the indices of nonzero elements.

See Also:
